title: Water resource conservation and reducing food losses are among priorities of Armenia’s Economy: Papoyan
description:
On November 28, Armenia’s Minister of Economy Gevorg Papoyan delivered a speech in Istanbul within the framework of the global Zero Waste Forum. The information was reported by the Ministry of Economy of Armenia.

In his remarks, the Minister stated that the conservation of water resources and the r...
